info.author: Mauro Luzzatto
info.name: explainy
info.summary: explainy is a library for generating explanations for machine learning models in Python. It uses methods from Machine Learning Explainability and provides a standardized API to create feature importance explanations for samples. The explanations are generated in the form of plots and text.
